name: 2025 15th International Conference on Environmental Engineering and Applications
content: Paper Publishing: For papers submitted to ICEEA 2025, after the peer reviewing process by at least 2-3 experts, all the accepted papers will be published in Internatonal Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264) ï¼Œwhich will be indexed by SCOPUS, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
